spacr.gui

.. py:class:: MainApp(default_app=None)

   Bases: :py:obj:`tkinter.Tk`


   The main graphical user interface (GUI) window for launching various SpaCr modules.

   This class creates a full-screen, themed Tkinter application with buttons to launch
   sub-GUIs for image mask generation, measurement, classification, and advanced analysis
   tools like regression, barcode mapping, and model activation visualization.

   :param default_app: If specified, directly launches the corresponding application view.
                       Should match a key in `main_gui_apps` or `additional_gui_apps`.
   :type default_app: str, optional

   .. attribute:: main_gui_apps

      :no-index: Mapping of main application names to functions and descriptions.

      :type: dict

   .. attribute:: additional_gui_apps

      :no-index: Mapping of optional analysis modules to functions and descriptions.

      :type: dict

   .. attribute:: main_buttons

      :no-index: Maps main GUI buttons to their description text.

      :type: dict

   .. attribute:: additional_buttons

      :no-index: Maps additional GUI buttons to their description text.

      :type: dict

.. py:function:: gui_app()

   Launch the main SpaCr GUI.

   This function initializes and runs the `MainApp` class with no default app specified,
   allowing users to select functionality from the startup screen.
